My Projects

YouTube LinkedIn GitHub

Trading Platform

I am currently working on an options trading platform which enables users to send orders to multiple accounts across multiple brokers at the same time. Over the summer, I plan on adding live quantitative signals to the website including machine learning based signals. Currently the website supports order placement and modification on the Kotak and Upstox brokers.

Python React Flask
GitHub

Cambridge Center for International Research

Spent 4 months researching the applications of mathematical optimization unders Professor Benoit Legat. Wrote a paper on the K-center problem, an NP-hard problem in combinatorial optimization. Discussed its applications including finding charging points for electric cars.

Mixed Integer Linear Programming (MILP) Julia
Paper

Tester, Video Editorialist

During high school, I made over 300 paid video editorials for Codechef on their YouTube channel. At the same time, I also tested over 20 contests for Codeforces which had close to 10,000 participants each. Codeforces and Codechef are the largest competitive programming platforms in the world.

Python C++ Video Editing
Codeforces Codechef
